artist: Author: Terri Pain; Publisher: Wreck Loose, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of face with designs and burning text printed in offset lithography on pink wove paper covers; 44 pp.

title: Pearl Casting For Swine
